import React,{useCallback,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const formStyle={display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',width:'300px',maxWidth:'90%',height:'400px',maxHeight:'90%',padding:'20px',boxSizing:'border-box',borderRadius:'20px',fontSize:'16px',boxShadow:'0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.19), 0 6px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23)'};const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const sendLoginData=useCallback(()=>{fetch('https://localhost:5600/login',{// replace with your server's address and port
method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,phone,password})}).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>console.log("received :",data)).catch(error=>{console.error('Error:',error);});},[email,phone,password]);const setValues=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setEmail(document.getElementById('loginEmail').value);setPhone(document.getElementById('loginPno').value);setPassword(document.getElementById('loginPassword').value);};useEffect(()=>{if(email&&phone&&password){console.log("tes1 ",email,phone,password);sendLoginData();}else{console.log("enter all values");}},[email,phone,password,sendLoginData]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center',height:'90vh'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{class:"p-3 mb-2 bg-secondary bg-gradient text-white",style:formStyle,onSubmit:setValues,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"loginEmail",children:"Email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",class:"form-control",id:"loginEmail","aria-describedby":"emailHelp",placeholder:"Enter email"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"loginPno",children:"Phone Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",class:"form-control",id:"loginPno","aria-describedby":"pnoHelp",placeholder:"Enter Phone Number"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"loginPassword",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",class:"form-control",id:"loginPassword",placeholder:"Password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{margin:"20px"},type:"submit",class:"btn btn-primary bg-dark bg-gradient",children:"Submit"})]})});}export default Login;
